pages.text: Freelancer's are recruited based on their skills. These can be roughtly divided in to 5 categories. Note that these distinctions are not concrete, many freelancers will fit in to more than one class

pages.title: The Warrior
pages.text: Hard to kill, pretends to be useful. Zero utility, just hand them a sword and hope they don't fall on it

pages.title: The Soldier
pages.text: What they don't realize is: everyone else can hold a gun and be equally useful in combat while still doing literally everything else better

pages.title: The Technician
pages.text: When you believe that solving problems is merely a matter of scale. Please stop breaking the game ...

pages.title: The Magister
pages.text: Freelancer who thinks sparkles and fancy robes makes you not a technician.

pages.title: The Colonist
pages.text: For when you want off mr. gravy's wild ride and for your base to not look worse than soviet era apartment buildings 10/10 would replace soldier with colonist again
